name: Untitled RTS Game Project
description:
How to play:

-Move with WASD/Arrow Keys. Rotate camera with J and L. Move up and down with scroll wheel.

-Click on large building with tents to recruit builders.

-Click on builder, select building and click to build. You can only build near your base camp or controlled strategic points.

-Select troops with box selection. Left click to deselect. Right click to move.

-Try to take all Strategic Points (yellow flags). Victory bar on the top right. Currently no victory/defeat animation.

-Don't let the enemies destroy all your buildings!

The game is currently in a very rough state and a lot of features are missing.

Thanks so much for playing! :)
